name: C0 scaffold (integration)
description: Merge C0 code/test, align behavior with the spec, and gate with fmt/clippy/tests.
acceptance_criteria: C0 code/test merged and match C0-spec
cargo fmt + clippy + relevant tests + integration gate executed and logged
start_checklist: Read plan, tasks.json, session_log.md, C0-spec.md, kickoff prompt
Set task status to in_progress in tasks.json (orchestration branch)

Create the integration branch and worktree: `git worktree add -b claude-code-cli-parity-2-1-29-c0-v2-1-29-integ wt/claude-code-cli-parity-2-1-29-c0-v2-1-29-integ feat/claude-code-cli-parity-2.1.29`.

end_checklist: Merge upstream code/test branches for C0 into the integration worktree and reconcile behavior to the spec.

Commit integration changes on the integration branch.
